display.title: Best Flight!
description: The Advanced Quantum Chestplate combines protection, a personal battery and an &&6ultimate Jetpack&&r into a single powerful piece of gear.
Note that this stores &&oa lot&&r of energy. You may want to invest in an &&3LuV Turbo Charger&&r.
&&l&&3Lore:&&r&&o This armor piece is inspired by the IndustrialCraft  Addon Gravisuite, which added the Gravitation Suit, analogous to this chestplate.

subtitle.text: I'll be seeing you in the skies!
